ResourceData.Name: Silicate
ResourceData.Description: Raw silicate ore, common throughout the galaxy. Used as a basic building material.

ResourceData.Name: Carbon
ResourceData.Description: Organic carbon deposits. Essential for advanced manufacturing processes.

ResourceData.Name: Refined Silicate
ResourceData.Description: Processed silicate material with improved purity and strength.

ResourceData.Name: Refined Carbon
ResourceData.Description: Purified carbon material suitable for high-tech applications.

ResourceData.Name: Composite Material
ResourceData.Description: Advanced composite combining refined silicate and carbon. Highly valuable.

ResourceData.Name: OMEN
ResourceData.Description: The standard galactic currency. Accepted everywhere in civilized space.
